publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2405 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Chickenpox Vaccineâ€”That the Parliament notes the current anxiety caused by the contentious MMR vaccine and possible links to autism; rejects the possible introduction of the chickenpox vaccine combined with the MMR vaccination, and further notes the insensitivity of the action of the UK Department of Health in Whitehall in introducing another live vaccine when there has been a call for single vaccinations due to the controversy and possible damage the triple MMR vaccine may have caused.
S1M-2405 Chickenpox Vaccine (lodged on 5 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2405 Chickenpox Vaccine (lodged on 5 November 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2405 Chickenpox Vaccine (lodged on 5 November 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2405# Chickenpox Vaccine (lodged on 5 November 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2405# Chickenpox Vaccine (lodged on 5 November 2001) Ms Margo MacDonald*
